amendment.description: To end lending schemes that force taxpayers to repay the loans of delinquent developers and bailout failed or poorly planned local projects.

action.text: Amendment SA 796 under the order of 10/20/2011, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 73 - 26. Record Vote Number: 185.

Amendment SA 796 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 738. (consideration: CR S6808-6809, S6846; text: CR S6809) To end lending schemes that force taxpayers to repay the loans of delinquent developers and bailout failed or poorly planned local projects.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 796 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 738.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 796 under the order of 10/20/2011, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 73 - 26. Record Vote Number: 185.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 796 under the order of 10/20/2011, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 73 - 26. Record Vote Number: 185.
